x.description: this is the x coordinate of object3D

y.description: this is the y coordinate of object3D

z.description: this is the z coordinate of object3D

rotationX.description: this is the rotation of the x coordinate of object3D

rotationY.description: this is the rotation of the y coordinate of object3D

rotationZ.description: this is the rotation of the z coordinate of object3D
